short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly manage your daily tasks with Taskit - the perfect productivity companion for your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Taskit is designed to help you manage your tasks effectively. With its user-friendly interface, you can easily add, edit, and delete tasks as needed. Stay organized and focused on your goals with this handy chrome extension.
